import React from 'react' const Register = () => { // Init State for Registration Data const[formData, setFormData] = React.useState({ parentName: "", parentEmail: "", parentPassword: "", // childName: "", // childUsername: "", // childPassword: "", }) // Update registerData whenever form data changes function handleChange(event) { const {name, value} = event.target; setFormData((prevFormData) => ({ ...prevFormData, [name]: value, })) } function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); alert("You have Registered!") console.log(formData) // FETCH POST fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/child-users/') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log('Data: ', data)) } return (

Parent Sign Up

) } export default Register
